SELECT bc.id, b.id as book_id, bc.order_book_code, bc.style_no, t1.sample_design_pic, t1.color_name, bc.group_flag, bc.group_code,
bc.design_status, bc.quadruple_price, bc.design_say, bc.plan_status, bc.plan_user_id, bc.plan_user_name, bc.fabric_tag_price, bc.product_plan_status, bc.product_plan_user_id, bc.product_plan_user_name, bc.production_date, bc.warehous_date, bc.urgency, bc.magnification, bc.production_total_num, bc.size_nums, bc.total_num,
b.image_url, IFNULL(sg.tag_price,t1.tag_price) tag_price, b.meet_flag, b.lock_flag,
t1.color_specification, t1.sales_type, t1.is_trim, t1.manufacturer, t1.manufacturer_no, t1.manufacturer_color,
t2.style_name, t2.design_no, t2.category_name, t2.prod_category1st, t2.prod_category, t2.prod_category2nd, t2.prod_category3rd, t2.brand, t2.band_code, t2.year, t2.season, t2.month, t2.sex, t2.devt_type, t2.designer, t2.designer_id
FROM t_sample_style_order_book_color bc LEFT JOIN t_sample_style_order_book b ON bc.order_book_code = b.order_book_code LEFT JOIN t_sample_style_group sg on bc.style_no = sg.style_no and sg.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN t_sample_style_color t1 ON bc.style_no = t1.style_no and t1.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN t_sample_design t2 on t1.design_no = t2.design_no and t2.del_flag = '0' WHERE bc.del_flag = '0' and bc.company_code = #{companyCode}
and bc.order_book_code like "%"#{orderBookCode}"%"
and bc.style_no like "%"#{styleNo}"%"
ORDER BY bc.order_book_code desc
